title: It’s Beginning to Feel a Lot Like Burning Man
author: Shalaco
content:
The Man has been lifted into place, the Temple has risen, street signs are being erected(and stolen!),art os rising from the playa, the DMV is open for business, there are reports of high police activity and it is incredibly dusty out.

The Man stands tall.

The Temple has risen.

The city’s street signs are in place:

The gate’s aren’t even open and signs have already been stolen. Knock it off!

A hat’s off to Larry from Sign Shop

Stealing Burning Man Art
